Class HashBucket

java.lang.Object
HashBucket
public class HashBucket
extends java.lang.Object
implementation of hash bucket,contains the parts(with their values) that construct a hash table . An array of buckets or slots, from which the desired value can be found.
Author:
ip

    • numKeys

      public int numKeys()
      it returns the number of keys in a hashBucket
      Returns:
      total number of keys in a hashBucket

    • insertKey

      public void insertKey​(int key, LinearHashing lh)
      it inserts a key in a hashBucket
      Parameters:
      key - the key we want to insert
      lh - the hasBucket's hash table

    • deleteKey

      public void deleteKey​(int key, LinearHashing lh)
      it deletes a key from a hashBucket
      Parameters:
      key - the key we want to delete
      lh - The hash table that this HashBucket belongs

    • searchKey

      public boolean searchKey​(int key, LinearHashing lh)
      its searches a key in a hashBucket
      Parameters:
      key - the key we want to search
      lh - the hasBucket's hash table
      Returns:
      if the key was found return true, else return false

    • splitHashBucket

      public void splitHashBucket​(LinearHashing lh, int n, int HashBucketPos, HashBucket newHashBucket)
      its splits a hashBucket
      Parameters:
      lh - the hasBucket's hash table
      n - the n used for the hash function
      HashBucketPos - the hashBucket position
      newHashBucket - the new hasBucket(it may contain some of the hashBuckets's values)

    • mergeHashBucket

      public void mergeHashBucket​(LinearHashing lh, HashBucket oldHashBucket)
      it merges two hashBuckets to one
      Parameters:
      lh - the hasBucket's hash table
      oldHashBucket - the old hashBucket

    • printHashBucket

      public void printHashBucket​(int HashBucketSize)
      it prints the hasBucket's informations
      Parameters:
      HashBucketSize - the size of the hashBucket
